summary.span: 內嵌層級動態內容項目，可提供裝載動態內容內超連結的能力。

span.span: An inline-level flow content element that provides facilities for hosting hyperlinks within flow content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會實作屬性，您使用設定按一下超連結應該巡覽至的內容。 implements the property that you set with the of the content that should be navigated to when the Hyperlink is clicked. 可以只在此發生巡覽，不過，如果有任一個的直接或間接父代是巡覽主機，包括， ，或可以裝載任何瀏覽器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)](其中包括[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)]，及Firefox 2.0 +)。 navigation can only occur, however, if either the direct or indirect parent of a is a navigation host, including , , or any browser that can host [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] (which includes [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)], and Firefox 2.0+). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < **巡覽裝載**中的主題[瀏覽概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)。For more information, see the **Navigation Hosts** topic in [Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md). 會強制執行強式的內容模型的子內容。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 請參閱[TextElement 內容模型概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)如需詳細資訊內容模型。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例顯示簡單使用項目。The following example shows simple use of a element. [!code-xaml[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUriXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_hyperlink_navurixaml)] 下列範例示範如何建立以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to create a programmatically. [!code-csharp[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_hyperlink_navuri)] [!code-vb[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_hyperlink_navuri)]

The default is .

para.span: 只有當 的直接或間接父代是巡覽主機時，包括 、，或任何可裝載 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] (包括 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)] 及 Firefox 2.0+) 的瀏覽器， 才可以巡覽至 屬性的值。

span.span: can navigate to the value of the property only if either the direct or indirect parent of a is a navigation host, including , , or any browser that can host [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] (which includes [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)], and Firefox 2.0+).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <<c0> **巡覽裝載**一節[瀏覽概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)。

span.span: For more information, see the **Navigation Hosts** section in [Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要連結至特定的內嵌項目，指定項目名稱加上井字號 （#）。To link to a particular inline element, specify the element name preceded by a pound symbol (#). 當使用者停留中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]，則[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]儲存在屬性會顯示在 [狀態] 列。When a user hovers the mouse over a in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] stored in the property is displayed in the status bar. 瀏覽至此[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]當使用者按一下。 navigates to this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] when the user clicks the . 如果的值使用者按下後的屬性變更後續巡覽要求之前會忽略的新值屬性，並巡覽至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]是值屬性，當使用者按一下。If the value of the property changes after the user clicks the and before the subsequent navigation request, ignores the new value of the property and navigates to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that was the value of the property when the user clicked the . > [!NOTE] > 您不會限制僅使用進行導覽。You are not restricted to only using a to do navigation. 您可以使用附加屬性，但只能從下列： ， ， ，和。You can use the attached property as well, but only from the following: , , , and . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性的項目。The following example shows how to use the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUriXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_hyperlink_navurixaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_hyperlink_navuri)] [!code-vb[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_hyperlink_navuri)] 下列範例示範如何使用**mailto:** [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]若要開啟新郵件視窗，其中包含電子郵件地址、 電子郵件地址和主旨和電子郵件地址，主旨和本文。The following example shows how to use a **mailto:**[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to open a new mail window that contains an email address, an email address and a subject, and an email address, subject, and body. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationMailToSnippet#MailToMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationMailToSnippet/CS/HomePage.xaml#mailtomarkup)]

summary.span: 處理 路由事件。

span.span: Handles the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會瀏覽至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]所指定屬性，並將標記為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]為已瀏覽。This method navigates to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] specified by the property, and marks the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] as visited. > [!IMPORTANT] > 根據主機電腦的安全性設定，某些形式的巡覽 (例如，瀏覽至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unc](~/includes/tlasharptla-unc-md.md)]路徑) 不允許在網際網路區域中。Depending on the host computer's security configuration, certain forms of navigation (for example, navigating to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unc](~/includes/tlasharptla-unc-md.md)] path) are not allowed in the Internet zone. 在此情況下，這個方法會要求完全信任。In such cases, this method will demand full trust. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 程式碼存取安全性](~/docs/framework/misc/code-access-security.md)。For more information, see [Code Access Security](~/docs/framework/misc/code-access-security.md).
